movies.title: Love Bavarian Style
movies.plot: Vittorio pretends to be gay so he can chaperone a rich man's daughter on vacation in Germany. Unfortunately his driver really is gay and Vittorio has a problem.
movies.simplePlot: Vittorio pretends to be gay so he can chaperone a rich man's daughter on vacation in Germany. Unfortunately his driver really is gay and Vittorio has a problem.

biography.bio: Elisabeth Volkmann was born on March 16, 1936 in Essen, Germany. She was an actress, known for Klimbim (1973), Lola, une femme allemande (1981) and Veronika Voss (1982). She was married to Eberhard Radisch and Walter Hass. She died on July 25, 2006 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Elisabeth Volkmann

biography.bio: Alexander Grill was born on June 30, 1938 in Graz, Styria, Austria. He was an actor, known for Wenn Mädchen zum Manöver blasen (1975), Bottoms Up (1974) and Love Bavarian Style (1973). He died on May 22, 2009 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Alexander Grill

biography.bio: Marie Ekorre was born on December 11, 1952 in Ludvika, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Love Bavarian Style (1973), Bathtime in Bangkok (1976) and Liz (1976).
biography.name: Marie Ekorre

biography.placeOfBirth: San Benedetto del Tronto, Marche, Italy
biography.bio: Rinaldo Talamonti was born on August 25, 1947 in San Benedetto del Tronto, Marche, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Les orgies du comte Porno (1969), Laissez les fesses faire (1973) and Graf Porno bläst zum Zapfenstreich (1970). He is married to Roswitha Talamonti. They have one child.
biography.name: Rinaldo Talamonti

biography.bio: Raoul Retzer was born on May 22, 1919 in Vienna, Austria as Raoul Richard Karl Pollitzer. He was an actor, known for Ohne Krimi geht die Mimi nie ins Bett (1962), Love Bavarian Style (1973) and Karussells werden im Himmel gemacht (1973). He died on August 8, 1974 in Vienna.
biography.name: Raoul Retzer

biography.bio: Dorothea Rau is an actress, known for Der Bumsladen-Boß (1973), Semmel, Wurst und Birkenwasser - Die liebestollen Handwerker (1972) and Oktoberfest! Da kann man fest... (1974).
biography.name: Dorothea Rau

biography.bio: Maja Hoppe is an actress, known for Love Bavarian Style (1973), The Countess Died of Laughter (1973) and Musik, Musik - da wackelt die Penne (1970).
biography.name: Maja Hoppe

biography.bio: Elisabeth Felchner is an actress, known for She Devils of the SS (1973), Sex Connection (1973) and Alpenglühn im Dirndlrock (1974).
biography.name: Elisabeth Felchner

biography.bio: Jürgen Schilling was born on December 3, 1948 in Stockach, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Gladiators (1969), Bathtime in Bangkok (1976) and Die wilde Hilde (1995).
biography.name: Jürgen Schilling

biography.bio: Juliane Rom-Sock is an actress, known for Yodeling Is No Sin (1974), Love Bavarian Style (1973) and Oktoberfest! Da kann man fest... (1974).
biography.name: Juliane Rom-Sock

biography.bio: Walter Klinger is an actor, known for Wer war es? (1972), Der alte Geizkragen (1967) and Oktoberfest! Da kann man fest... (1974).
biography.name: Walter Klinger

biography.bio: Ulrich Beiger was born on August 26, 1918 in Munich, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for The Great Escape (1963), Percy Stuart (1969) and The Terrible People (1960). He was married to Hannelore Schützler. He died on September 18, 1996 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Ulrich Beiger

biography.bio: Werner Röglin was born on April 23, 1938. He is an actor, known for Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 6: Eine Mutter namens Waldemar (1982), Hurra - Die Schwedinnen sind da (1978) and Bathtime in Bangkok (1976).
biography.name: Werner Röglin

biography.bio: Erich Kleiber was born on November 12, 1929 in Troppau (Opava), Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Le couteau dans la tête (1978), Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 4: Die versaute Hochzeitsnacht (1978) and Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose, 5. Teil: Die Bruchpiloten vom Königssee (1978). He died on December 11, 1985.
biography.name: Erich Kleiber
